"INFORMATION:


Released: 2015
Genre: Action / RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Reality Pump Studios
Publisher: TopWare Interactive
Platform: PC
Publication Type: RePack
Language: English
Language: English
Tablet: enclosing (CODEX)


"SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:


Operating System: Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
Processor: Intel i5 or i7 or Equivalent AMD Quad Core CPU with 2.2 GHz
Memory: 4GB
Video card: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 670  AMD Radeon HD 7970 with 2 GB or better
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
Free space on hard disk: 11 GB


"DESCRIPTION:


Raven's Cry represents an action-adventure with a grim story, rediscovering the image of a pirate in popular culture. In contrast to the usually charming but reckless pirates who popularized in the generations of pirate stories in fiction, the player will try on the role of Christopher Raven, fateful anti-hero, who 
became a pirate to avenge their murdered relatives.
